comments.content: Around April 8, encountered identical troubles and reported it (via feedback). Still doesn't work ... at least not for me. :-/
I had the same thing and in the end a moderator had to do it by converting to PNG format.

Error message reads:

"\* The selected file /var/www/vhosts/typophile.com/httpdocs/cms/files/tmp/tmp\_Jh4KNg could not be copied.  
 \* Failed to upload the picture image; the pictures directory doesn't exist."

Neither GIF, JPG or PNG formats seem to work.  
(They are within file size & dimension guidelines)

I e-mailed Zara about a month ago, and I was assured it was being looked into, so I think we just have to hold tight for a bit. Punchcut appears to be looking to fill a Senior Interaction Design position. There-in may lie our limbo...
